title: Georgia and Kate Fowler beam as they step out in white outfits to attend a fragrance Sydney
text:
She travels all over the world to model for some of the biggest names in fashion.

But Georgia Fowler, 27, enjoyed some quality family time with her older sister Kate, 29, on Thursday, with the two siblings attending the Azzaro Wanted Girl fragrance launch in Sydney.

The genetically-blessed duo beamed as they made their way into Bondi Icebergs for the event.

Sister, sister! Model sisters Georgia, 27 (right), and Kate Fowler, 29 (left), beamed as they stepped out in white outfits for the Azzaro Wanted Girl fragrance launch at Sydney's Bondi Icebergs on Thursday

The Auckland-born stunner, who is the face of the fragrance, wowed in a white, off-the-shoulder mini dress with long, puffy sleeves.

Her short frock drew attention to her long and lean pins, as well as her minimal floss heels.

For makeup, the brunette beauty went for a glowing, flawless complexion with a hint of blush on her cheeks and a nude pout.

Beaming beauties: Georgia, who is the face of the fragrance, wowed in a white, off-the-shoulder mini dress with long, puffy sleeves.

Georgia accessorised her look with a small white handbag featuring gold chain.

Kate, who is the former partner of billionaire Justin Hemmes, also dressed for the event wearing white.

The mother-of-two opted for a maxi dress with a pleated skirt and a deep V neckline.

Statuesque stunners: Her short frock drew attention to her long and lean pins, as well as her minimal floss heels

She styled her hair up in a low ponytail to show off her statement earrings, while for makeup she kept it simple with mascara and nude pink lips.

For a pop of colour, Kate opted for a red clutch to her look.

Kate split with Merivale CEO Justin, who she shares two daughters with, back in July 2018.
description: She travels all over the world to model for some of the biggest names in fashion.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
